questions.question_text: "loyalty" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A customer’s ongoing support for a brand or service
questions.example_sentence: Members earn points as a reward for their loyalty to the hotel chain.
questions.explanation:
ロイヤルティ・継続的な支持
旅行日程表
割引クーポン
部屋のアップグレード

questions.question_text: "accumulate" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To gather or build up gradually
To pay a fee in advance
questions.example_sentence: Points accumulate each time a member stays at a participating hotel.
questions.explanation:
蓄積する・積み重なる
突然失う
前払いする
予約を取り消す

questions.question_text: "redeem" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: To exchange points for rewards or benefits
To check in earlier than usual
To transfer membership to another person
questions.example_sentence: Members can redeem their points for free nights or room upgrades.
questions.explanation:
ポイントを交換する
早めにチェックインする
料金を比較する
会員資格を他人に譲る

questions.question_text: "tier" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A level or rank in a system
questions.example_sentence: The new program has four membership tiers based on annual spending.
questions.explanation:
ランク・階層
客室タイプ
季節ごとの旅行プラン
キャンセル料

questions.question_text: "benefit" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A special type of hotel tax
questions.example_sentence: Higher-tier members enjoy additional benefits such as late checkout.
questions.explanation:
利益・特典
ホテル税
旅行書類
予約時間の規則
